metadata.title: CVE-2014-3005 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in Zabbix 1.8.x before 1.8.21rc1,2.0.x before 2.0.13rc1, 2.2.x before 2.2.5rc1, and 2.3.x before 2.3.2allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files or potentially executearbitrary code via a crafted DTD in an XML request.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
